analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#99-100) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#190-223)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#308-334)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#411-422)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#426-443)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#495-499) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#235-253):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#249-250)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#250-251)
Campaign.sealed (state variable @ /unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol) shadows built-in symbol "sealed"

Campaign.fill has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! tokenContract.generateTokens(dth,amount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol)

Reentrancy in Campaign.fill (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol):
	External calls:
	- ! tokenContract.generateTokens(dth,amount) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#495-499)
	- /unique_chucks/31/0x0aecaad227f0c0dbddddef7e9a841d19c61b2724.sol#496-499
